title: Popup to Sidebar Migration v1.6.2.0
details:
Complete migration of popup settings UI to Firefox Sidebar API completed in v1.6.2.0.

CHANGES MADE:
1. Copied entire popup.html (1544 lines, 51KB) to sidebar/settings.html
2. Modified body CSS from fixed 400x600px to 100vh/100% for sidebar
3. Added 5th tab "Manager" with iframe to quick-tabs-manager.html
4. Copied popup.js (42KB) to sidebar/settings.js
5. Updated manifest.json:
   - Removed default_popup from browser_action (Firefox now opens sidebar on icon click)
   - Changed keyboard shortcuts:
     - Settings: Ctrl+Shift+S → Alt+Shift+S
     - Quick Tabs Manager: Ctrl+Alt+Z → Alt+Shift+Z
   - Version bumped to 1.6.2.0
6. Updated manifest.chrome.json:
   - Kept default_popup for Chrome compatibility
   - Updated Quick Tabs Manager shortcut to Alt+Shift+Z
   - Version bumped to 1.6.2.0
7. Updated package.json version to 1.6.2.0
8. Updated README with new shortcuts and sidebar features

SIDEBAR TABS (5 total):
1. Copy URL - All keyboard shortcut settings
2. Quick Tabs - Quick Tab configuration, positioning, sizing
3. Appearance - Dark mode, notifications, tooltip/notification styling
4. Advanced - Console log filtering (16 categories), debug mode, storage management
5. Manager - Quick Tabs Manager (iframe of quick-tabs-manager.html)

TECHNICAL DETAILS:
- Background.js already had code to open sidebar on toolbar click (lines 1271-1286)
- Sidebar uses same settings storage as popup (browser.storage.sync)
- Console log filtering with collapsible groups preserved
- All 1819 unit tests passing
- Build successful with no errors

CROSS-BROWSER SUPPORT:
- Firefox: Sidebar opens on toolbar click or Alt+Shift+S
- Chrome/Edge/Brave: Popup opens on toolbar click (unchanged)
- Both browsers use Alt+Shift+Z for Quick Tabs Manager

FILES MODIFIED:
- manifest.json (removed default_popup, updated shortcuts)
- manifest.chrome.json (updated version and shortcut)
- package.json (version bump)
- README.md (updated keyboard shortcuts and features)
- sidebar/settings.html (replaced with full popup.html content + Manager tab)
- sidebar/settings.js (replaced with popup.js content)
